title: Tuesday Post Show (4-27-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (4-27-21)
description:
Bobby shares a post from the B-Team Facebook page from a listener who let their kids have a “Yes Day”. Bobby talks to Morgan2 about why things are so negative on our show Facebook page and what makes it not so good. Bobby on how he changed Amy and Eddie from being late all the time to being early. Amy and Raymundo both had awkward situations at restaurants.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
